name: kMDItemAttributeChangeDate
description: The date and time of the last change made to a metadata attribute.

name: kMDItemAudiences
description: The audience for which the file is intended. The audience may be determined by the creator or the publisher or by a third party.

name: kMDItemAuthors
description: The author, or authors, of the contents of the file.

name: kMDItemAuthorAddresses
description: This attribute indicates the author addresses of the document.

name: kMDItemCity
description: Identifies city of origin according to guidelines established by the provider.

name: kMDItemComment
description: A comment related to the file. This differs from the Finder comment, kMDItemFinderComment.

name: kMDItemContactKeywords
description: A list of contacts that are associated with this document, not including the authors.

name: kMDItemContentCreationDate
description: The creation date of an edited or optimized version of the song or composition.

name: kMDItemContentModificationDate
description: The date and time that the contents of the file were last modified.

name: kMDItemContentType
description: The UTI pedigree of a file.

name: kMDItemContributors
description: The entities responsible for making contributions to the content of the resource.

name: kMDItemCopyright
description: The copyright owner of the file contents.

name: kMDItemCountry
description: The full, publishable name of the country or region where the intellectual property of the item was created, according to guidelines of the provider.

name: kMDItemCoverage
description: The extent or scope of the content of the resource.

name: kMDItemCreator
description: Application used to create the document content (for example "Word", "Pages", and so on).

name: kMDItemDescription
description: A description of the content of the resource. The description may include an abstract, table of contents, reference to a graphical representation of content or a free-text account of the content.

name: kMDItemDueDate
description: Date this item is due.

name: kMDItemDurationSeconds
description: The duration, in seconds, of the content of file. A value of 10. 5 represents media that is 10 and 1/2 seconds long.

name: kMDItemEmailAddresses
description: Email addresses related to this item.

name: kMDItemEncodingApplications
description: Application used to convert the original content into it's current form. For example, a PDF file might have an encoding application set to "Distiller".

name: kMDItemFinderComment
description: Finder comments for this file.

name: kMDItemFonts
description: Fonts used in this item. You should store the font's full name, the postscript name, or the font family name, based on the available information.

name: kMDItemHeadline
description: A publishable entry providing a synopsis of the contents of the file. For example, "Apple Introduces the iPod Photo".

name: kMDItemIdentifier
description: A formal identifier used to reference the resource within a given context.

name: kMDItemInstantMessageAddresses
description: Instant message addresses related to this item.

name: kMDItemInstructions
description: Editorial instructions concerning the use of the item, such as embargoes and warnings. For example, "Second of four stories".

name: kMDItemKeywords
description: Keywords associated with this file. For example, "Birthday", "Important", etc.

name: kMDItemKind
description: A description of the kind of item this file represents.

name: kMDItemLanguages
description: Indicates the languages of the intellectual content of the resource. Recommended best practice for the values of the Language element is defined by RFC 3066.

name: kMDItemLastUsedDate
description: The date and time that the file was last used. This value is updated automatically by LaunchServices everytime a file is opened by double clicking, or by asking LaunchServices to open a file.

name: kMDItemNumberOfPages
description: Number of pages in the document.

name: kMDItemOrganizations
description: The company or organization that created the document.

name: kMDItemPageHeight
description: Height of the document page, in points (72 points per inch). For PDF files this indicates the height of the first page only.

name: kMDItemPageWidth
description: Width of the document page, in points (72 points per inch). For PDF files this indicates the width of the first page only.

name: kMDItemParticipants
description: The list of people who are visible in an image or movie or written about in a document.

name: kMDItemPhoneNumbers
description: Phone numbers related to this item.

name: kMDItemProjects
description: The list of projects that this file is part of. For example, if you were working on a movie all of the files could be marked as belonging to the project "My Movie".

name: kMDItemPublishers
description: The entity responsible for making the resource available. For example, a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a publisher should be used to indicate the entity.

name: kMDItemRecipients
description: Recipients of this item.

name: kMDItemRecipientAddresses
description: This attribute indicates the recipient addresses of the document.

name: kMDItemRights
description: Provides a link to information about rights held in and over the resource.

name: kMDItemSecurityMethod
description: The security or encryption method used for the file.

name: kMDItemStarRating
description: User rating of this item. For example, the stars rating of an iTunes track.

name: kMDItemStateOrProvince
description: Identifies the province or state of origin according to guidelines established by the provider. For example, "CA", "Ontario", or "Sussex".

name: kMDItemTextContent
description: Contains a text representation of the content of the document. Data in multiple fields should be combined using a whitespace character as a separator.

name: kMDItemTitle
description: The title of the file. For example, this could be the title of a document, the name of a song, or the subject of an email message.

name: kMDItemVersion
description: The version number of this file.

name: kMDItemWhereFroms
description: Describes where the file was obtained from.

name: kMDItemAuthorEmailAddresses
description: This attribute indicates the author of the emails message addresses. (This is always the email address, and not the human readable version).

name: kMDItemRecipientEmailAddresses
description: This attribute indicates the recipients email addresses. (This is always the email address, and not the human readable version).

name: kMDItemTheme
description: Theme of the this item.

name: kMDItemSubject
description: Subject of the this item.

name: kMDItemCFBundleIdentifier
description: If this item is a bundle, then this is the CFBundleIdentifier.

name: kMDItemFSHasCustomIcon
description: Boolean indicating if this file has a custom icon.

name: kMDItemFSIsStationery
description: Boolean indicating if this file is stationery.

name: kMDItemInformation
description: Information about the item.

name: kMDItemURL
description: Url of the item.
